question: List off label uses for Rituximab.
ideal_answer: Off label uses for rituximab are for poly- and dermatomyositis, multiple sclerosis, immune thrombocytopenia, systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), lupus nephritis (LN), and other immune diseases.

Conventional treatment of systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) and lupus nephritis (LN) is associated with damage accrual, hence increased morbidity rate. Off-label use of rituximab (RTX) has shown significant promise in this patient group; however, data are still controversial.
